title: Peaceful Fantasy Music
description: 12 beautiful, peaceful music tracks in two versions - with tail and loopable.
longDescription:
Catharsis | Peaceful Fantasy Music

by Wiktoria Zac


LISTEN NOW


This music pack contains 12 music tracks in two variations (12 full with tail and 10 seamless loops, which gives 22 tracks total).

Designed for Fantasy Worlds, RPGs, and everything in between! Perfect for promotional purposes. The tracks have been created using the best quality tools and techniques.


The pack includes:

 ➼ 12 Professionally mastered original tracks in two variations

 ➼ Minutes of audio provided: full 40 min 36 sec | seamless loops 33 min 31 sec

 ➼ CD-quality 16/44.1 kHz .wav format


TRACKLIST (44.1kHz, 16bit, Stereo)

▶ New Dawn | full mix - 3:30 | loop - 3:27

▶ Swan Queen | full mix - 3:51 | loop - 3:46

▶ Dreams | full mix - 3:16 | loop - 3:12

▶ Symbol of Hope | full mix - 3:12 | loop - 3:09

▶ Flora | full mix - 3:55 | loop - 3:52

▶ Fallen Stars | full mix - 3:19 | loop - 3:17

▶ Sunbeam | full mix - 2:46 | loop - 2:42

▶ Into the Woods | full mix - 3:21 | loop - 3:17

▶ Valley of Flowers | full mix - 3:11 | loop - 3:08

▶ The Great Library | full mix - 3:46 | loop - 3:41

▶ Frost Kissed | full mix - 2:41

▶ Autumn | full mix - 3:48


If you're looking for original music for your project, feel free to reach out to me at wiktoriazac@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
